E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 6/9/1993
Subject: Extension?
Dear Sir,
I am really enjoying playing for your team.
I would be interested in a contract extension!
How about you?

Regards,
Nick Esasky



Date: Friday, 6/27/1993
Subject: Extension?
Hello Sir,
Are you interested in negotiating a contract extension?
You know, I'm in my final year. I'd like to stay here!

Sincerely,
Ron Darling



Date: Monday, 7/14/1993
Subject: Progress of Matt Herges
Dear Sir,
Matt Herges has an ERA of 2.87 at A Helena Handbaskets!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Sunday, 7/20/1993
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,

in my last year of the contract.

I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Mario Soto
